## Question:

## Quantity of Interest:

## Preceptor Table:

Units - students (now)

Covariates - race

Outcome - score

## Counter-argument for 4 key assumptions of population table:

Validity - 

Stability - the education system is constantly changing and this may impact the quality of it

Representativeness - this sample only represents people with access to proper schooling that provides this standardized test
